title: Online Science Education Design Workshop Applying Empathy-Centered Design Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Hands-on program to develop competencies in designing online science education content.

learning_goals: Learners can develop online science education scenarios by utilizing the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test).
Learners can improve interactive elements of online science experiment modules by incorporating peer feedback.
Learners can create learner-centered rubrics for evaluating online science education content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
